featured.text: Mr. Wang’s arguments were very , and the committee finally accepted his proposal.
After retirement, Mr. Wang _____ ice skating, which he had always loved but had not had time for. (A) appealed to (B) took to (C) related to (D) saw to 15.
Because Mr. Wang changes his mind, it’s very difficult to predict what he will do next.
Wang Chien-ming, the Yankees’ best pitcher last year, already showed his great _____ for baseball when he was still a teenager.
The many awards that Professor Wang has won over the years are clear ______ that he is a distinguished scholar.

definition.zh_def: 王：指君主或統治者，或用作姓氏。
definition.en_def: Wang: A surname in Chinese, also meaning 'king' or 'monarch'.
definition.example: Mr. Wang is a respected leader in the community.
